cyclone.name: KATIA
cyclone.current_location: about 135 mi ESE of Tampico, Mexico
cyclone.trajectory: Meandering slowly east-southeast, then expected to drift west-southwest toward the Veracruz coast of Mexico over the next two days

weather_observation.watch_coast: None at this time (hurricane watch possible later for Veracruz, MX only)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Mexican coast from about Tampico southward to Veracruz in the southwestern Gulf of Mexico
weather_observation.wind: Only a very small (4%) chance of experiencing brief tropical-storm-force gusts; most likely just occasional breezy conditions.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected along the lower Texas coast.
weather_observation.rainfall: Little to no heavy rainfall expected; any showers should remain light and scattered.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Increased swells and rip currents possible along south Texas beaches.
